Hi, I thought I'd show you this image of genetic art using NEAT.

http://www.cambrianlabs.com/Mattias/DelphiNEAT/Images/GeneticArt.jpg

Inputs are bias, x (-1 to 1), y, and radius from center. The output is
forced into the range 0..1 and translated to grayscale.

The fitness function is the user...

cheers,
mattias
